sense.name: physically consume or take in a substance
sense.examples: The child may have ingested a poisonous mushroom. This diet recommends ingesting less saturated fats. You ingest this medicine through dissolvable tablets.

sense.name: mentally absorb information
sense.examples: He spent his days ingesting the contents of the local library. It was hard to ingest all that information in her lecture. Bob ingested the main points of the article but skipped the details.
